data.eml:eml: Two new species and a new record of Anacroneuria (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from Central Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bispo, Pitágoras Da Conceição, Costa, Lucas De Souza Machado, Novaes, Marcos Carneiro (2014): Two new species and a new record of Anacroneuria (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from Central Brazil. Zootaxa 3779 (5): 591-596, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3779.5.9
